name: Space Traveling Debbie
description:
Space Traveling Debbie is a single-player defense game featuring Debbie, the space commander.

Her mission is to go in and out of the alien's den injecting as much droplets of seeds as she can while at the same time managing the ship's defenses by shooting with turrets and repairing them with energy collected from injecting seeds. This ship however, is unique in its' own ways. For the ship to actually function, Debbie has to dance and whip out her hips! To reload the turret's she must empty out the ammunition and wait for it to cooldown.

You lose when all your turrets are destroyed by the aliens!

This was made on the Global Game Jam 2018  under the theme transmission.

Keyboard Controls:

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Spacebar - Interact
Left Shift  - Cancel Interaction

Optional Gamepad Controls:

Left - Move Left
Right - Move Right
A - Interact
B - Cancel Interaction

Credits:

Studio Gumbledom

Game Programmer: Dyle Ouano 

Game Artist: Clint Hennesy Cagang

Music: Nathan Aldemita and NoodleSushi
